alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:47PM CDT until May 13 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FULTON AND KNOX COUNTIES... At 546 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Abingdon, or 9 miles south of Galesburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Landspout tornadoes could also occur with these storms. This severe storm will be near... Galesburg around 600 PM CDT. Knoxville around 605 PM CDT. Maquon and Gilson around 610 PM CDT. Williamsfield and Victoria around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Snake Den Hollow, Dahinda, Galesburg Airport, Ellisville, Delong, East Galesburg, St. Augustine, Middle Grove and Henderson. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 40 and 65. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
